abstract: Ryan Patrick Smith makes his New York Times Crossword debut.
lead_paragraph: FRIDAY PUZZLE — In December, Smithsonian magazine contacted me to ask for a comment on the end of the decade in crossword puzzles. I was in the process of writing my own take on this, but I don’t think it will surprise anyone that I jumped on an opportunity to offer my opinion. The magazine assigned a reporter, Ryan Patrick Smith, to write the retrospective, and we had a very nice chat. He has linked to his article in the constructor notes below.
